title: Draven axes are much harder to catch after todays patch.
body:
I've played so many games with {{champion:119}} and never in my life had I missed so many axes. 
There is some bug that has made some axes vanish upon hitting the ground.
Please look into this.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gAN8-dQ6-wI


EDIT:
Most axes are being caught as normal. These "vanishing axes" occur randomly, however they can be game changing if vanished at the wrong time.

replies.body: In the video, he is doing some very hectic axe catching and one of the axes are randomly vanishing even though they were caught every single time. That seems to be the bug. Upon further examination, an axe vanishes when Draven is standing on two axe landing symbols or if Draven is in the middle of an auto right before a regular axe is thrown.
I made a video of the issue.
What specifically have you noticed that is different? Can you give me a bit of examples?
